products.title: Carrots
products.recipe: From roasts, salads and soups to casseroles and cakes, Carrots will lend sweetness, texture and colour to an enormous number of recipes.

products.title: Apples
products.descr: An apple is a round fruit with red or green skin and a whitish inside. One variety of apple might be sweet, another sour. The apple isn't just a fruit.
products.recipe: Using a sharp knife, slice the apple into thin, even segments, revealing its juicy interior. Finally, spread a generous layer of walnut paste onto each slice, adding a delightful nutty flavor to the refreshing sweetness of the apple.

reviews.name: Agata Smith
reviews.text: This apple was incredibly crisp and refreshing, perfect for a healthy snack.

reviews.name: Estelle Chavez
reviews.text: The flavor of this apple was exceptional, striking a perfect balance between sweetness and tartness.

reviews.name: Janice Yates
reviews.text: I loved the vibrant red color of this apple, and it tasted as good as it looked.

reviews.name: Kimberly Vargas
reviews.text: This apple had a not good aroma that made me disgust the first bite.

reviews.name: Lenny Coffey
reviews.text: The texture of this apple was pleasantly crunchy, making each bite enjoyable.

products.title: Peaches
products.recipe: Wash peaches before eating or cooking under clean water, lightly rubbing the surface with your hand or a fruit and vegetable brush. This will remove dirt, bacteria and possible pesticide residues.

farms.descr: We work hard to ensure that the fruit and vegetables we sell are fresh and high in quality. If we don't grow them ourselves, we source them from carefully chosen suppliers, preferring to buy locally whenever possible.
